name: Snowboard Dash
description:
Description

This is a game made in 1 month for the Secret Santa Jam. You and 3 other snowboarders decided to hit the slopes and make it a little interesting. Race to the bottom, using weapons and powerups littered around the course. Then, head back to the top and do it again. How fast can you scale the mountain and claim victory?

This ended up being a demo of the game I was planning to make with some placeholder art still being used, but I hope it's enjoyable!

Controls

A/D - Turn Left and Right
S (While Turning) - Slow Down
Mouse - Look Around
Esc - Pause

Space (Hold) - Charge Jump
Space (Release) - Jump

1 - Use Weapon (Red Collectible)
2 - Use Powerup (Blue Collectible)

Each present box costs 100 coins, make sure to collect as many as possible on your way down the mountain.
